content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ غَدٍ عَنْ أَدَاءِ سُنَةِ سِتَةٍ مِنْ شَوَالٍ لِلّٰهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu shauma ghadin ‘an ada’i sunnati sittatin min syawwâlin lillâhi ta‘âlâ.

translation.id: Aku niat puasa sunah Syawal di esok hari karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to perform the Sunnah fast of Shawwal tomorrow for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
